overview:
Eric Dombach is a recognized name in the world of business coaching. Armed with over a decade’s worth of experience in the industry, he launched The Coaches’ Coach, a business coaching firm that caters to the exclusive needs of business coaches all over the world. From training, marketing assistance, to proper systems, The Coaches’ Coach guides budding business coaches to carefully and effectively establish their brands.

More on The Coaches’ Coach and Eric Dombach is available at http://mycoachescoach.com/.

milestones.description: Eric Dombach shares the Ten Commandments for an exceptional customer service.
milestones.source_description: Eric Dombach: The ten commandments of customer service

milestones.description: Eric Dombach is a veteran business coach who has been consulted by over 100 small to mid-sized companies.
According to Eric Dombach, client testimonials can make big claims without boasting. Visit http://goo.gl/7RzyD
milestones.source_description: Eric Dombach: Why client testimonials are important for every coach

milestones.description: Having sold his business for $1 million, Eric Dombach created The Coaches' Coach, which offers training services and resources for those who wish to pursue a career in business coaching. Visit http://goo.gl/Dsz6g
milestones.source_description: Eric Dombach: Be a business coach

milestones.description: Just like a coach for a sports team, a business coach like Eric Dombach helps his people focus on the game. Visit http://goo.gl/fALhu
